item.description:
Gazebo Concert Series

Bring your lawn chair and relax to the music of Soind of Frank from 7:00 p.m. to 8:30 p.m. in Elmwood Senior Center’s Gazebo. It’s free! Rain location is the Elmwood Community Center. Cosponsors are At-Home Care, Kearns & Kearns, Sheehan-Hilborn-Breen Funeral Home and Hoffman’s Summerwood. Call 561-8180 for informatation

Eat for a Good Cause at Cosi's; Fundraiser benefits Conard and Hall Safe Grad parties

Families making the mad dash through school concerts, extra-inning baseball games and late soccer practices can order in or take out from Cosi's on Tuesday, June 9 and June 16 and help support the Conard and Hall Safe Grad parties for seniors. On June 9, Conard High School musicians will entertain diners at Cosi, 970 Farmington Avenue. The restaurant will donate a portion of sales between 4 p.m. and 8 p.m. The groups that will perform are: Various Artists, whose members are Katie Ronan, Evan Waaramaa, Sean Lemkey, Caleb Gallops, Brendan Porter and Scott Rodd; and the Conard Jazz Combo of Jon Lis, Ronan, Waaramaa and Gallops. The following Tuesday, June 16, Hall High School’s Safe Grad party will be the beneficiary of sales, also from 4 p.m. to 8 p.m. Safe Grad is held in each of the West Hartford public high schools on graduation night from 10 p.m. to 5 a.m. Approximately 700 seniors in the Class of 2009 will attend all-night, substance-free parties on June 24-25 free of charge, as the parties are funded completely through parent and community donations. Parents of graduating seniors started organizing for Safe Grad in November and will work through June planning, decorating and chaperoning the parties, which feature entertainment, food, dancing, crafts and games at the high schools

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Sounds Of Frank Quartet at the Elmwood Community Center.
